name: gorillapresenter
description: Gorilla Presenter is a complete presentation tool packed into **a single HTML file**. Everything lives there: the slides themselves, the editor, a media recorder (for desktop Chrome, Brave, and Firefox), and supporting resources. Basic use doesn't require installing any apps or that you even have an internet connectionâ€”just open the file in your regular web browser. The goal is to support all major modern desktop and mobile browsers (i.e., **not** Internet Explorer). Some plugins (for instance, Maps and Wikipedia) do require a network connection, but the basic system will work just fine without one.

scripts.build: node GorillaBuilder/bundler.js && node GorillaBuilder/zipper.js && node GorillaBuilder/encoder.js
